answers.answer: Swelling is normal towards the end but with a history of preeclampsia you are more susceptible to getting it again. Swelling in the hands and face are usually indicators of preeclampsia. I would definitely schedule an appointment with the doc just to make sure everything is ok. Better safe than sorry, good luck mama!
Thanks that's what I was thinking because with my other pregnancies the signs started showing at this time

question: I'm 33 weeks today & I have been getting swelling in my feet/ankels & Arms& Hands a lot I've had pre eclampsia past 2 pregnancies but seem to be okay this time I still am high risk though due to all the problems I previously had is the swelling normal towards the end?
title: Swelling Everyday?!
